welcome_message_body: Welcome to Upland, where small town charm meets big city amenities. Known for its historic downtown, beautiful parks, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Upland has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for airlines such as Delta, Southwest, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international and domestic flights for airlines such as American, JetBlue, and Volaris.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect for free with a provided password.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport, where all commercial flights are served.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norton AFB Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Norton AFB Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and air cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
